home.hero_subtitle: Ein dezentralisiertes Brettspiel , angetrieben durch Nebulas smart contracts, welches strategisches Können, kritisches Denken und Wissen von Handelswissenschaft braucht.
home.introduction_paragraph: At the dawn of the decentralized app era and after a long journey of great deprivation, your wallets finally reach the shores of an uncharted blockchain board game. The Game of Blocks.
home.introduction_paragraph2: But you are not the first conqueror, other fearless crypto-aficionados are approaching the blocks, they will do whatever they can to overthrow your kingdom and claim the Throne!! The conquest has begun!
home.explanations_paragraph2: Jedes Stück Land kann bis zu 5 mal gekauft werden, immer im Preis steigend.
home.explanations_step1_left_paragraph:
1/3 of all players transactions
go to the Treasure Chests.
home.explanations_step1_middle_paragraph:
All land can be purchased empty
or occupied by other players
home.explanations_step1_right_paragraph:
Overthrown Lords will receive
2X their initial investment
home.explanations_rules_bigtitle:
Extend your block kingdom
to claim the Throne.
home.explanations_rules_paragraph:
Choose up to 5 types of land, each having its own reward chest.
Each land can be bought up to 5 times, steadily increasing price of land.

If a land is frozen, it's not yet available.
Every 24 hours, 10 ice lands will melt and be made available as Forest, Mountain, Desert, Plain or Water
home.hero_title: Conquer blocks. Build your kingdom. Earn your keep.
home.home_first_paragraph: Plains, Forests, Mountains, Deserts, and Lakes, The map is a beautiful island surrounded by frozen land.
home.home_second_paragraph: Build your kingdom block by block, but be sure to choose your land carefully and upgrade your kingdom wisely!
home.home_third_paragraph: Map holds a treasure chest. The treasure chest will be awarded to the most powerful kingdom at the end of each game.
home.tutorial_description_step1: At the start of each game, 50 Level-1 blocks will be made available for purchase on a first come first serve basis.
home.tutorial_description_step2:
It won’t take you more than 0.03 NAS to start your kingdom

Blocks are given a level starting at Level-1.

explanations_paragraph: Du kannst Land jederzeit kaufen, um dein Königreich zu erweitern.

menu.no_nebulas_desc: Das Spiel verlangt die Nebulas Wallet Erweiterung, welche für Google Chrome erhältlich ist.

map.banner_new_blocks: 25 NEW BLOCKS PRICED AT 0.01 WILL APPEAR IN:
map.lock_description: By locking your land other players won't be able to steal your block, unlock is free if later you decide to sell your land
map.steal_gain: Your gain if someone takes your land:
map.transaction_history_subtitle: Visualize price increases for every transaction
map.map_roll_dice_description: Roll a dice for 0.03 NAS. After a win dice roll block level will drop.
map.desc_leaderboard: Sei der König um die Kiste zu gewinnen
map.land_locked:
This land is locked by his owner.
You can't buy it.
